title: Beyond Veggie by Secret Recipe - Suria Sabah Shopping Centre
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Chinese, International, Western, Take-out, Asian, Bakery
description: Offers a varied menu of vegetarian food and cakes. Has pasta, pizza, sandwich, salad, noodle, and rice dishes. Note that tofu is made with egg. Modern atmosphere with many tables. Multiple locations in Malaysia; this one is on the first floor of the mall.
streetAddress: Suria Sabah Shopping Centre, Lot G5, 1-8 & 1-79 G & 1st Floor
